CustomField.formula: IF( Innova_IsApproved__c =true, IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png","Green"), IF ( Innova_IsRejected__c =true,IMAGE("/img/permissions_deny16.gif", "Red"), IF ((ISPICKVAL(Status,"Submitted for Approval")),IMAGE("/img/alohaSkin/help_orange.png", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/checkbox_unchecked.gif", "None"))))
CustomField.label: ApprovalStatus
